name: City Ambulance Simulator 3D
description:
Get ready ambulance rescue driver you’re on-duty and there is massive accident in this ambulance game.Enjoy real city ambulance driving in this ambulance rescue simulator 3d to be the dutiful ambulance rescue member of the team.This ambulance rescue game is what you need! Turn on the sirens and try to become an ambulance driver.

Drive FAST, yet SAFELY, and use your alert eye to deliver aid.Ambulance driver job is dangerous so be careful! Duty driving is not that easy. Life in the city is crazy, watch out for the people and the traffic.

Features:
- Different rescue missions
- Tons of ambulance vehicles to choose
- Full 3D City large environment
- Simulator driving smooth controls

Play Ambulance Game for free! Have fun with your family and friends!
